skins.shipDescription: Ning Hai-class Light Cruser, Ping Hai
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Ning Hai, the first ship of the Ning Hai-class. Big sister told me to say this when I was introducing myself. Ah? I'm Ping Hai? That's right! Then... I'm Ping Hai, the first ship of the Ning Hai-class... I'm wrong again? This is so confusing...
skins.acquisition: Commander? Big sister told me that commanders who can’t even put food on the table are no good. Can you support yourself? ...Then, how about me?
skins.login: Commander, have you eaten yet? You can’t work on an empty stomach.
skins.details: What are you looking at, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Socks? Big sister said we should spend less money, so we share one pair together...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Kung Fu? Big sister said we could earn some Coins by performing on the street, so I learned that too...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Pandas? On our heads? They're also sisters!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, do you also want a hug? I hug my big sister all the time.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Big sister told me to beat up any bad guys that I come across. But what is a bad guy?

skins.shipDescription: Hi~ya! Hmm... this feels... nothing special. Baobao looks happy though... Never mind, Commander, Ping Hai is hungry!
skins.acquisition: Hi~ya! Hmm... this feels... nothing special. Baobao looks happy though... Never mind, Commander, Ping Hai is hungry!
skins.secretaryIdle1: My sister bought another pair of socks again, but then gave them to me... Could it be that she actually wants to wear them?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Baobao, stop jumping onto Commander's head to practice shadowboxing...
skins.secretaryIdle3: You want me to stop doing high kicks? Why though?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, why are you putting my sister and I on opposite sides of the door? Huh? Exorcism?

skins.shipDescription: Shaved ice is better than steamed buns, fireworks are prettier than shaved ice, and more precious than fireworks is...
skins.acquisition: Shaved ice is better than steamed buns, fireworks are prettier than shaved ice, and more precious than fireworks is...
skins.login: B-big sister, where are we...? And where is everyone...? Eek! I-I think I just heard something... Oh, right, this place is uninhabited.
skins.details: Big sister and I got lost on on this strange island and saw some weird stuff... What was weird about it? Look, it was really weird, that's all!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Liquor chocolates? Wait, no, big sister! You shouldn't eat those...!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Big sister told me the dining table is a battlefield of its own, so I'm gonna stay on my guard!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Aww... I wanna ride on the Commander's shoulders too...
skins.secretaryTouch: D-don't stare at me like that... Fine, I'll give you a third of my ice cream... Ugh, okay, half! But no more than that!

skins.shipDescription: Commander, happy Mid-Autumn Festival! I have mooncakes, pomegranates, and osmanthus cakes... Mm... This holiday is the best!
skins.acquisition: Commander, happy Mid-Autumn Festival! I have mooncakes, pomegranates, and osmanthus cakes... Mm... This holiday is the best!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Om nom... Hey, Commander, what flavor of mooncake do you like?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Just so you know, Commander, I'm an unrivaled champion at hammering mooncake!
skins.secretaryIdle3: The sweet osmanthus cakes my sister made smell delicious. You want one, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Happy Mid-Autumn Festival! Do you wanna make a traditional lantern, Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I feel like I could hop all the way up to the moon in this outfit...

skins.shipDescription: Big sister says that even though we have some money now, we still have to save as much as we can. Um... Anyway, I'm the younger "Dragon Sister," Ping Hai. Erm... I'm kind of hungry. Do you maybe have something to eat?
skins.acquisition: Big sister says that even though we have some money now, we still have to save as much as we can. Um... Anyway, I'm the younger "Dragon Sister," Ping Hai. Erm... I'm kind of hungry. Do you maybe have something to eat?
skins.login: Commander, are you here for my show?
skins.details: I think big sister really likes her idol outfit.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Big sister says all I need to do is be myself up on stage, but the truth is I don't know how to be myself unless she tells me...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, do you think I should try doing kung fu up on stage? Like this.. hiyaa!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I think everybody really likes Baobao. Let me do a show with Baobao next time!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you want to get up on stage with me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I think I'm wearing it right?

skins.shipDescription: The Sakura Empire has lots of delicious food that I've never tried before! Yeah! It's a great place!
skins.acquisition: The Sakura Empire has lots of delicious food that I've never tried before! Yeah! It's a great place!
skins.login: Commander, I wanna try the Sakura Empire's take on ramen!
skins.details: Big sister made a stupidly jam-packed schedule. Just looking at it makes me sleepy... But there's apparently lots of tasty food by the tourist attractions, so I'm coming along!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Big sister said this is a prize vacation, so we can't try out all the local restaurants... What even is a "prize vacation"?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Big sister looks thrilled to get to enjoy a vacation! Seeing her smile, and getting to eat so much good food, has me feeling thrilled too!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Let go of my jacket, big sister~! I've not finished my food yet! Give it a try you too, it's really yummy!
skins.secretaryTouch: The goal of our vacation? Mine is to try *all* of the Sakura Empire's yummiest food!

skins.JPClientName: デリシャス?クリムゾン
skins.shipDescription: There's always a lot of delicious food at these parties! But, my sister said I'm not allowed to have any cake until everyone's gotten their slice... Baobao, let's be on our best behavior!
skins.acquisition: There's always a lot of delicious food at these parties! But, my sister said I'm not allowed to have any cake until everyone's gotten their slice... Baobao, let's be on our best behavior!
skins.login: Here's your cake. Eat up. Ning Hai is passing out blueberry cake, but I've got strawberry.
skins.details: Just like Ning Hai's, me and the girls made my cake with love. It's a chao ji da strawberry cake... I wonder how many days it would take for me to eat by myself...? Hehehe.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Baobao, where do I bring the next slice...?
skins.secretaryIdle2: There's going to be so much good stuff at the party... Commander, they have to have some baozi, don't they?!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Ning Hai always says I need to make more friends... But really I have so many friends already!
skins.secretaryTouch: Ning Hai told me to pass out my cake without bothering the Commander!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Mm. I've known for a long time, my sister and I are very different in that department.
